androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatTextV.android:text: • Open the motor hatch with the machine turned off
Take a picture of yout radiator
Check your radiator for bent fins
Take a picture of the belts to the water pump and fan
Check the tightness and condition of the belts to the water pump and fan
Check the rolling of the bearings for the fan, water pump and alternator
• Keep the hatch open and turn on yout motor (be careful for moving parts)
Inspect the hoses for any leaks of coolant fluid
Listed for odd sounds from the water pump
Ensure the fan is spinning correctly and creating an air-flow through the radiator and motor block
Bleed the coolant to ensure there are no air-pockets disrupting the flow
